content.raw: The find modules for fuel-tools are being reviewed, but I don't think they have been tested on windows. If it's possible to do a quick test of these modules on windows before a release, that would be nice, especially since we had to make a breaking change to the ZeroMQ find module to fix windows support.
content.html: The find modules for fuel-tools are being reviewed, but I don't think they have been tested on windows. If it's possible to do a quick test of these modules on windows before a release, that would be nice, especially since we had to make a breaking change to the ZeroMQ find module to fix windows support.
